    • getFilteredLogEntries

      public static List<String[]> getFilteredLogEntries(String userNric, String action, LocalDateTime fromTimestamp, LocalDateTime toTimestamp)
      Get filtered log entries
      Parameters:
      userNric - Filter by user NRIC
      action - Filter by action type
      fromTimestamp - Filter by start timestamp
      toTimestamp - Filter by end timestamp
      Returns:
      Filtered list of log entries

    • exportLogToCSV

      Export log entries to a CSV file
      Parameters:
      filePath - Path to export the log
      entries - Log entries to export
      Throws:
      IOException - If there's an error writing to the file
